Player History
Injured on 4/9/1966 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1971, off Gary Gentry (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1971, off Clyde Wright (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1971, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1975, hitting .667 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/2/1977 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 4/23/1980...
Injured on 9/20/1980 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/13/1981 to a 2-year deal worth $5,252,522 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 8/24/1982...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/4/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Released by St. Louis on 2/5/1983...
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1985...
Injured on 9/7/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/12/1988 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
